item.title: Report Studio Bullet Chart – Missing Target
item.description: Today I was working on a bullet chart in Cognos Report Studio. The chart was rendering, but the target bar would never appear. Here’s the scenario I was in and how I resolved my issue: My Goal: My goal was to show the average time to process an application against a target processing time for the current fiscal year. My Situation: My “actual” value was being returned in my query to the data warehouse – It is an average of the days to process an application (defined in Framework Manager).
